answers.answer: Hello!There can be several causes of lack of libido in women which can be physical and psychological. Psychological causes are Depression, stress, anxiety, overwork etc.Physical causes are anemia, medical conditions like diabetes, asthma, hormonal imbalances, menopause etc.Have a frank discussion with your wife about your feelings and emotions. A visit to family clinic may help. Involve her in good foreplay that might help. Take care and regards!
